resources.string: The connection has failed while adding %s. Check your connection and try again.
An application requires Google Play Services to be enabled.
An application requires installation of Google Play Services.
An application requires an update for Google Play Services.
An application attempted to use a bad version of Google Play Services.
Please verify if your SD card is mounted and has enough space to store the backup.
Cannot create the backup in Google Drive.
Something is wrong with Google Drive.
An error to upload to Google Drive.
Backup your series data to Dropbox or Google Drive and restore whichever version you want.
This app won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
This app won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone.
This app won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet.
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
Unknown issue with Google Play services.
The date on the device appears to be incorrect. Please check the date on the device.
Google Play services, which some of your applications rely on, is not supported by your device. Please contact the manufacturer for assistance.
This app won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
Do you really want to remove %s?
Check your Internet connection and try again.
Failed to communicate with Google Play™. Please, check your Internet connection.
Screenshots are not available for this feature.
Check your connection and try again.
The actual backup file has no series to restore.
Check your Internet connection and try again.
Backup files not found in Dropbox.
Please make sure that you SD card is mounted and there\'s a valid backup file in the backup folder.
An error to download from Google Drive.
Something is wrong with Google Drive.
Backup files not found in Google Drive.
The backup file that you are trying to restore from is invalid.
The backup file that you are trying to restore from has not a valid database version.
Backup files nonumbert found in SD card.
There are no backups to restore.
Manage your schedule from your home screen.\n\nAlso available for the lock screen on devices with Android 4.2+.
Schedule widget is a premium feature. Purchase it now and manage your schedule from the home screen. \n\nIt can also be added to the lock screen on devices with Android 4.2+
